# nxos_ipv4_prefix_list (Data Source)

This data source can read an IPv4 Prefix List configuration.

- API Documentation: [rtpfxRuleV4](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-3-1/docs/Routing%20and%20Forwarding/rtpfx:RuleV4/)

### Additional API Documentation

- [rtpfxEntry](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-3-1/docs/Routing%20and%20Forwarding/rtpfx:Entry/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_ipv4_prefix_list" "example" {
  name = "RULE1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) IPv4 Prefix List name.

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `entries` (Attributes List) IPv4 Prefix List entries. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--entries))
- `id` (String) The distinguished name of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--entries"></a>
### Nested Schema for `entries`

Read-Only:

- `action` (String) IPv4 Prefix List entry action.
- `criteria` (String) IPv4 Prefix List entry criteria.
- `from_range` (Number) IPv4 Prefix List entry start range.
- `order` (Number) IPv4 Prefix List entry order.
- `prefix` (String) IPv4 Prefix List entry prefix.
- `to_range` (Number) IPv4 Prefix List entry end range.
